full_text:
SEVERABILITY.
	(Added by Ord. No. 172,176, Eff. 10/1/98.)

	Should any portion of this ordinance be declared invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remainder shall continue in effect and shall be interpreted is such manner as to effectuate the objectives set forth in Section 64.70. of this article.

1.name: Stormwater And Urban Runoff Pollution Control
1.label: article

3.catch_line: Elimination Of Illicit Discharges And Illicit Connections.

6.catch_line: Authority To Arrest And Issue Citations.

9.catch_line: Liability For Costs Of Correction Arising From Unlawful Discharge.

11.catch_line: Stormwater And Urban Runoff Pollution Education.

14.catch_line: Stormwater Pollution Control Measures For Development Planning And Construction Activities.

15.catch_line: Authority Of The Board Of Public Works.

18.catch_line: Authority To Inspect And Enforce Stormwater Pollution Control Measures.

next_section.catch_line: Stormwater Pollution Control Measures For Development Planning And Construction Activities.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

SEVERABILITY. (§ 64.70.13)

  SEVERABILITY.
	(Added by Ord. No. 172,176, Eff. 10/1/98.)	Should any portion of this ordinance
be declared invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remainder shall
continue in effect and shall be interpreted is such manner as to effectuate the
objectives set forth in Section 64.70. of this article.
